teaser: Tavi Gevinson — actor, fashion blogger, feminist and editor-in-chief of Rookie magazine (not to mention America’s imaginary teen sister) — jokes about “beauty essentials.”
title: “Ironic Misogynist Joke” – Tavi Gevinson
